item.title: Password audits
item.description: This should be a brief overview on why and how to perform a password audit on a windows domain

About Me I just needed a place to post random stuff I come up with. Therefor this humble blog. I am a Norwegian telco/wireless engineer who have been working over a decade as a penetration tester. On my spare time I do security research, and collect stuff like cipher machines, mechanical calculators and antique knives.
Presentations This page’s purpose is to share presentations I have given at conferences, workshops etc.
